body:
Hello There,
If you're new to Avicus within the last 4 months you wouldn't know who I am.
Basically, some events happened which lead to a Network Ban for me and my friend {tag=bff56e079469477281be84fc627ea113}, other stuff happened, my ban was changed and it expired this morning and now I'm here.

Now, AMA time, my last one, none of this opinions stuff.
body_tagged:
Hello There,
If you're new to Avicus within the last 4 months you wouldn't know who I am.
Basically, some events happened which lead to a Network Ban for me and my friend  Camemes, other stuff happened, my ban was changed and it expired this morning and now I'm here.

Now, AMA time, my last one, none of this opinions stuff.

damn the party is over
Indeed it is, rip the dream

what u do after avicus shuts down?
Already answered this, look above

Any servers you are moving to for YouTube?
Ummm, probably a combination of Zildith and the occasional Stratus, once Pagoda really gets off the ground, good community and a decent playerbase, then I will record there too.

How’s life
Alright, just finished education for the year and planning out how I want next year to work out.

replies.body: Shadow my boy, I will straight with you, I do not mind you as a person, you seem chill and cool, But during my MOD times I admit you use to get on my nerves, you just did your job too well, and occasionally just tended to be a bit annoying. But asides from that, cya around :)
